document.full_text: british and french attack helicopters struck inside libya for the first time overnight on saturday, hitting targets in the oil port of brega as nato forces stepped up their air war against muammar gaddafi.
document.title: nato helicopters ratchet up pressure on gaddafi
lines_and_colors: british and french attack helicopters struck inside libya for the first time overnight on saturday, hitting targets in the oil port of brega as nato forces stepped up their air war against muammar gaddafi.
